LanguageData.AvaliClothes.label: Avali clothing
LanguageData.AvaliClothes.description: Allows creation of Avali clothing.\n\nThey can be worn only by Avali because of their unique body size and structure.
LanguageData.AvaliPlants.label: Avali plants
LanguageData.AvaliPlants.description: Sowing and cook plants of Avali homeworld. Kiri fruits, Nakati ovoids and Piru colonies.
LanguageData.AvaliLifeSupportBelt.label: Life support belt
LanguageData.AvaliLifeSupportBelt.description: Craft life support belts that create a personal bubble of air breathable by Avali.
LanguageData.AvaliHolograms.label: Avali holograms
LanguageData.AvaliHolograms.description: Build compact and modern holographic television.
LanguageData.AvaliLighting.label: Avali LED lamps
LanguageData.AvaliSurvivalGear.label: Survival gear
LanguageData.AvaliSurvivalGear.description:
Build basic survival gear and headset with basic enviromental support system.

- Can be worn only by Avali.
- Can be researched only by Avali.
LanguageData.AvaliScoutArmor.label: Scout armor
LanguageData.AvaliScoutArmor.description:
Make scout armor and scout's HUD with basic enviromental support system.

- Can be worn only by Avali.
- Can be researched only by Avali.
LanguageData.AvaliExosuit.label: Avali exosuits
LanguageData.AvaliExosuit.description:
Make exosuits that increase working and walking speed. Include basic enviromental support system.

- Can be worn only by Avali.
- Can be researched only by Avali.
LanguageData.AvaliGuardianArmor.label: "Guardian" combat suit
LanguageData.AvaliGuardianArmor.description:
Make "Guardian" combat suit with improved enviromental support system. Lots of armor, but very heavy and has almost no electronic assistance.

- Can be worn only by Avali.
- Can be researched only by Avali.
LanguageData.AvaliCombatArmor.label: Standart combat suit
LanguageData.AvaliCombatArmor.description:
Make standard Avali combat suit with improved envriomental support system. Nicely balances armor and user assistance systems.

- Can be worn only by Avali.
- Can be researched only by Avali.
LanguageData.AvaliHellcatArmor.label: "Hellcat" combat suit
LanguageData.AvaliHellcatArmor.description:
Make "Hellcat" combat suit with improved enviromental support system. Lightly armored and packed with all possible user assistance systems.

- Can be worn only by Avali.
- Can be researched only by Avali.
LanguageData.AvaliPrinting.label: Nanolathe
LanguageData.AvaliPrinting.description: Build an Avali Nanolathe that allows quick production of Avali technology.
LanguageData.AvaliWeaving.label: Nanoloom
LanguageData.AvaliWeaving.description: Build a nanoloom to weave graphene and nanofiber.
LanguageData.AvaliAerogel.label: Aerogel printing
LanguageData.AvaliAerogel.description: Allows you to print aerogel. Aerogel is an ephemeral lattice of molecules with incredible structural properties, despite weighing next to nothing.
LanguageData.AvaliMelee.label: Avali melee weapons
LanguageData.AvaliMelee.description: Craft spears and swords out of aerogel using nanolathe or machining table.
LanguageData.AvaliRocketLaunchers.label: Avali rockets
LanguageData.AvaliRocketLaunchers.description: Allows you to build "Firedart" rocket launchers and produce rockets.
LanguageData.AvaliRailguns.label: High-velocity weapons
LanguageData.AvaliRailguns.description: Produce most of the Avali railgun weaponry using nanolathe.
LanguageData.AvaliMiniguns.label: Hybrid miniguns
LanguageData.AvaliMiniguns.description: Allows you to build "Hailstorm" hybrid miniguns.
LanguageData.AvaliNanites.label: Nanite body modifications
LanguageData.AvaliNanites.description: Create injectors of body enchancing nanite colonies.
LanguageData.AvaliCybernetics.label: Avali cybernetics
LanguageData.AvaliCybernetics.description: Build limb replacement cybernetics that enhance the user.\n\n- Can be researched only by Avali.
LanguageData.AvaliCyberneticsAdvanced.label: Advanced cybernetics
LanguageData.AvaliCyberneticsAdvanced.description: Build advanced body replacement cybernetics made out of plasteel. Can suppress the effect of pack loss.\n\n- Can be researched only by Avali.
LanguageData.AvaliAugments.label: Augments
LanguageData.AvaliAugments.description: Build top-tier body modifications at fabrication bench. Can be used by non-Avali.
LanguageData.AvaliShieldBelt.label: Avali shield belt
LanguageData.AvaliShieldBelt.description: Allows you to make avali shield belt.\n\nIn comparision to standard human shield belt, it provides a 3 times stronger field but with 2 times higher recharge duration.
LanguageData.AvaliTurretSmall.label: Railgun turrets
LanguageData.AvaliTurretSmall.description: Allows you to build Avali "Cerberus" railgun turrets.\n\nDespite its low rate of fire, it provides strong and highly accurate defense at very long range. All Avali turrets consume a lot of power due to usage of railgun technology.
LanguageData.AvaliTurretMedium.label: Hybrid minigun turret
LanguageData.AvaliTurretMedium.description: Allows you to build Avali "Ripper" hybrid minigun turret.\n\nHigh rate of fire at medium range, with the tradeoff of being relatively weak and not very accurate.
LanguageData.AvaliTurretLarge.label: Rocket launcher turret
LanguageData.AvaliTurretLarge.description: Allows you to build Avali "Thrasher" rocker launcher turret.\n\nWith perfect balance of range and accuracy, it shoots expensive high explosive missiles at user selected rate of fire.
LanguageData.AvaliAeroponics.label: Aeroponics
LanguageData.AvaliAeroponics.description: Build modular aeroponics with higher initial cost than classical hydroponics, allowing for faster and more energy efficient growth.
LanguageData.AvaliLTRW.label: Low tech railgun
LanguageData.AvaliLTRW.description: Create pistols and SMG Avali and also of the power module. The machine for creating the latter will be available after studying the Avali nanolathe technology.
